_sText:
Surf_cp_desolation_v1

by ZaLoS

and SolidSurf

custom textures by ZaLoS, IceCreamLock

this is the regular version of this map, for the deathmatch version please go to:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/55914


***v2 changes***
Made the water clear so it is easier to see people in the middle sections
Ramp touchups
Modified the ? in the jail so there will be no more bouncing knifeless people
***************


Capture Point!!! In the center of the map you will see a platform with a light above it. This platform is thecapture point. Each team starts with 180 points that tic down every second. First team to 0 loses. By taking the capture point you can stop your teams ticker from ticking. In order to take the capture point, it must be clear of people from the other team, it takes 10 seconds to capture the point. Afterwards you can leave the point and it will remain yours untill a member of the opposing team stands on it for 10secs.

Losers go to loser jail, winners go to winner jail :D

Special Thanks:
The Kosher Pork for setting up Beta testing, and intox. Gaming for testing! testers include intox. Firefox,intox. Scareface, intox. Seaking,  intox. Tom, intox. Clutch, IceCreamLock, intox. Zman and many more! Addtional thanks to www.solidsurf.info, fpsbanana.com, and other individuals such as PaperCut and Bucknasty formapping advice ;)



NOTE: This map is not intended for deathmatch servers. The deathmatch version can be found at http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/55914. No block is required for this map. 



surf this map and many other great maps @ intox. Gaming's surf server! 72.5.86.125:27015
